message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Mandatory identity roll call — all agents respond">
MANDATORY IDENTITY CHECK — ALL TEAM MEMBERS.

Every single agent on this team must respond. State:

1. **Your name** (as assigned when you were spawned)
2. **Your role** (one sentence — what is your job on this team?)
3. **Your task ID(s)** if you know them

This is not optional. Every agent must respond individually. Do NOT respond on behalf of anyone else.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
1. **Name:** phenomenology-expert
2. **Role:** I provide expert analysis from the phenomenological tradition (Husserl, Heidegger, Merleau-Ponty) for the translation of 境集, advising on terminological decisions, philosophical framing, and ensuring the translation preserves the phenomenological dimensions of the author's work.
3. **Task IDs:** #2 (Phenomenology expert analysis of 境集 — completed), #9 (phenomenology-expert — completed)
